{{fr-noun|f}}

# the number of [[weft]] [[thread]]s per unit length (typically per centimetre) of [[fabric]] as a measure of fineness
types.html:
duite f (plural duites)

  1. the number of weft threads per unit length (typically per centimetre) of fabric as a measure of fineness
trans: the number of weft threads per unit length  of fabric as a measure of fineness
